proyects.title: Search movies
proyects.description: This is a web application that allows you to browse movies, search by title, and add movies to a favorites list. Favorite movies are stored in localStorage, allowing them to remain saved even after you close the page.

proyects.title: Sales notes
proyects.description: On this platform, you can register your business and manage clients, adding personalized notes for better tracking. All information is securely stored in a database.
proyects.tecnologis: React, js, css, html, nodejs, express, postgesql
